entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 09:00 AM ADT Sunday 01 May 2016
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
